alert.note: Alert for Chippewa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:19PM CDT until July 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Chippewa County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cornell, or 20 miles south of Ladysmith, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Chippewa County, including the following locations... Holcombe, Otter Lake and County Roads F And H. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
